dsl_rule: IMPLIES(GE(field2, field1 - 1), LE(field1 + field2, 14)) using field1/field2
predicate: field1 and field2 are within the same IE and relate to slot boundaries
notes: The evidence suggests a relationship between nrofSymbols and startPosition to ensure they do not exceed slot boundaries.

full_api_response.dsl: IMPLIES(GE(field2, field1 - 1), LE(field1 + field2, 14)) using field1/field2
full_api_response.predicate: field1 and field2 are within the same IE and relate to slot boundaries
full_api_response.notes: The evidence suggests a relationship between nrofSymbols and startPosition to ensure they do not exceed slot boundaries.
